rows.label: qst102201_msg0001
rows.name:
Nis, the Gulan who just joined
the mercenary corps...

rows.label: qst102201_msg0002
rows.name:
I think he might be the one
who killed my mom and dad.

rows.label: qst102201_msg0003
rows.name: When I was little...

rows.label: qst102201_msg0004
rows.name:
My parents left me in Torigoth,
saying they were going on a mission
with his mercenary group.

rows.label: qst102201_msg0005
rows.name:
But only their Core
Crystals came back...

rows.label: qst102201_msg0006
rows.name:
The innkeeper who was looking after
me investigated for me, but...

rows.label: qst102201_msg0007
rows.name:
All she found out was that he
was the only one who came back,
and he left immediately after.

rows.label: qst102201_msg0008
rows.name:
There were rumors he took the reward
for himself, or that he abandoned his
comrades to a monster to save himself.

rows.label: qst102201_msg0009
rows.name:
To me, he's a coward who left my
mom and dad to die and ran away.

rows.label: qst102201_msg0010
rows.name:
I told Yuu-san that he's
a dangerous man...

rows.label: qst102201_msg0011
rows.name:
But he said he didn't seem
like a bad person and
wouldn't listen to me.

rows.label: qst102201_msg0012
rows.name:
I want you to find proof that
Nis is the enemy... that he
betrayed my mom and dad.

rows.label: qst102201_msg0013
rows.name:
I really want to take revenge
with my Blade... but I can't
do that here in the village.

rows.label: qst102201_msg0014
rows.name:
I just want him to apologize for
taking my mom and dad from me.

rows.label: qst102201_msg0015
rows.name:
I'm sorry to ask something
like this of you.

rows.label: qst102201_msg0016
rows.name: Nis is at the training grounds.

rows.label: qst102201_msg0101
rows.name: Mom, Dad...

rows.label: qst102201_msg0201
rows.name: How did it go?

rows.label: qst102201_msg0202
rows.name:
You're still not sure...?
Huh? A mission?

rows.label: qst102201_msg0203
rows.name:
This is your chance! Talk
to him during the mission
and find out what happened.

rows.label: qst102201_msg0301
rows.name:
Talk to Nis during the
mission and find out what
happened to my mom and dad!
